column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: record. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix record: <http://example.com/ontology/record#> .# Class Definitionsrecord:Record rdf:type rdfs:Class .record:AudioRecord rdf:type rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:subClassOf record:Record .record:DocumentRecord rdf:type rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:subClassOf record:Record .# Property Definitionsrecord:hasTitle rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain record:Record ;  rdfs:range xsd:string .record:hasCreatedAt rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain record:Record ;  rdfs:range xsd:dateTime .record:hasAuthor rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain record:Record ;  rdfs:range xsd:string .record:hasLength rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain record:AudioRecord ;  rdfs:range xsd:duration .record:hasPages rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain record:DocumentRecord ;  rdfs:range xsd:integer .# Instance datarecord:rec1 rdf:type record:AudioRecord ;  record:hasTitle "Moonlight Sonata" ;  record:hasCreatedAt "2022-02-23T18:25:43.511Z"^^xsd:dateTime ;  record:hasAuthor "Ludwig van Beethoven" ;  record:hasLength "PT15M"^^xsd:duration .record:rec2 rdf:type record:DocumentRecord ;  record:hasTitle "War and Peace" ;  record:hasCreatedAt "2022-02-24T10:00:00.000Z"^^xsd:dateTime ;  record:hasAuthor "Leo Tolstoy" ;  record:hasPages 1225 .```
